doc:
Dennis Franz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dennis_Franz 0 Dennis Franz Schlachta (; born October 28, 1944), known professionally as Dennis Franz, is an American actor best known for his role as NYPD Detective Andy Sipowicz in the ABC television series NYPD Blue (1993–2005), a role that earned him a Golden Globe Award, three Screen Actors Guild Awards and four Primetime Emmy Awards. He also portrayed Lt. Norman Buntz in the similar NBC series Hill Street Blues (1985–1987) and its short-lived spinoff, Beverly Hills Buntz (1987–1988). Dennis_Franz_Schlachta ( ; born October_28_,_1944 ) , known professionally as Dennis_Franz , is an_American_actor best_known for his_role as NYPD_Detective_Andy_Sipowicz in the_ABC_television_series_NYPD_Blue ( 1993 – 2005 ) , a_role that earned him a_Golden_Globe_Award , three_Screen_Actors_Guild_Awards and four_Primetime_Emmy_Awards . He also portrayed Lt._Norman_Buntz in the_similar_NBC_series_Hill_Street_Blues_(_1985 – 1987 ) and its_short-lived_spinoff , Beverly_Hills_Buntz_(_1987 – 1988_) .
